content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://odscontainer@coviddatalakestore.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.dimDate (
	[DateKey] int,
	[Date] date,
	[DayName] nvarchar(4000),
	[isWeekDay] bit,
	[DayOfWeek] int,
	[DayOfMonth] int,
	[DayOfQuarter] int,
	[DayOfYear] int,
	[WeekOfYear] int,
	[WeekName] nvarchar(4000),
	[MonthOfYear] int,
	[MonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarQuarter] int,
	[CalendarQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[CalendarYear] int,
	[FiscalMonth] int,
	[FiscalMonthName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalQuarter] int,
	[FiscalQuarterName] nvarchar(4000),
	[FiscalYear] int
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'dates.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [odscontainer_coviddatalakestore_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.dimDate
GO
